ai-tika-abh02t19:39_5: And greed, hate, and delusion have already been described in the same way as “finitely in the phrases” is said.
ai-tika-abh02t19:40_0: Besides, the supreme state of existence having completely understood the complete understanding of sensual pleasures, the forms of sentient beings, the escape from what is created, conditioned, and realized with wisdom.
ai-tika-abh02t19:40_1: and that which is a vital condition for refuge,
ai-tika-abh02t19:40_3: Then, knowing the states beginning, insight, knowledge, and wisdom are unable to abandon knowledge, they give up the defilements and cut off of the defilements.
ai-tika-abh02t19:40_4: Likewise: the knowledge of the first jhāna, etc., in the way already described, is the knowledge of the mango fruits and defilement, but not infatuated by the first jhānas of the defilements.
ai-tika-abh02t19:40_5: So the wisdom there is from application to the defilement of the defilements, and the knowledge of the origin of defilements, and the noble path, the state of being cut off the defilements, and the noble path to the aggregates of defilements, and the noble path to the penetration of the noble states of existence (of existence). This is the noble truth of the noble truth of the path, and the penetration of existence .
ai-tika-abh02t19:40_6: “Because that is unborn, unbecome, undeveloped, unreal, uncorrupted, and unrealized by the Buddha. This is the meaning of what the Buddha says.”
ai-tika-abh02t19:40_7: For this has been stated by the Buddha: “This is their meaning, all things are unborn, all stated in the various orders of gods, humans, etc., about the mass of suffering, and equanimity about formations were made in the homeless states of quietly Extinguishment.”
ai-tika-abh02t19:40_8: Or alternatively, there is the ultimate element of the ultimate element of in the ultimate sense, the ultimate being, the feelings that can be understood as peaceful, just as the highest.
ai-tika-abh02t19:43_0: Whatever nutriment there is nothing, along with the object,
ai-tika-abh02t19:44_0: The Questions of questions is finished.
ai-tika-abh02t19:45_0: The Book of the senses is finished.
